title.native: 冴えない彼女の育てかた
title.english: Saekano: How to Raise a Boring Girlfriend

description:
The life of Tomoyo Aki, a highschool otaku working part time to support his BD hoarding. With remarkable luck, he bumps head-first into Megumi Kato, the most beautiful girl he has ever seen. Naturally, the meeting twists his life into a complicated torrent of relationships. Eriri Spencer Sawamura, his half-foreigner childhood friend who’s always valued her relationship with MC. Kasumigaoka Utaha, a cold, composed renowned literary genius who shoves everyone aside from our protagonist. What is this? An eroge introduction?

The tale of a small not quite doujin circle, but not quite indie studio’s journey through the tough territory of comiket and beyond.

Note: Includes episode 0.
synonyms: วิธีปั้นสาวบ้านให้มาเป็นนางเอกของผม

tags.name: Otaku Culture
tags.description: Centers around the culture of a fanatical fan-base.

tags.name: Female Harem
tags.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several female characters who are romantically interested in them.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Software Development
tags.description: Centers around characters developing or programming a piece of technology, software, gaming, etc.

tags.name: Meta
tags.description: Features fourth wall-breaking references to itself or genre tropes.

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: School Club
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a school club scene.

tags.name: Writing
tags.description: Centers around the profession of writing books or novels.

tags.name: Video Games
tags.description: Centers around characters playing video games.

tags.name: Kuudere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who generally retains a cold, blunt and cynical exterior, but once one gets to know them, they have a very warm and loving interior.

tags.name: Tsundere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who acts cold and hostile in order to mask warmer emotions.

tags.name: Love Triangle
tags.description: Centered around romantic feelings between more than two people. Includes all love polygons.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Nudity
tags.description: Features a character wearing no clothing or exposing intimate body parts.

tags.name: Drawing
tags.description: Centers around the art of drawing, including manga and doujinshi.

Luna Haruna is a punk/loli reader model of KERA magazine. She was a finalist in the 4th Animax Anisong Grand Prix as Aya Itou (伊藤彩).  

[Blog](https://ameblo.jp/harunaluna-official) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/luna_galaxy) | [Official Website](https://www.harunaluna.jp/)
